Detailed Description

Node descriptor.

Mandatory for each node.

Definition at line 56 of file appFramework.h.

Field Documentation

uint8_t NodeDescriptor_t::reserved

Device role:
000 - ::DEVICE_TYPE_COORDINATOR,
001 - ::DEVICE_TYPE_ROUTER,
010 - ::DEVICE_TYPE_END_DEVICE,
011-111 - reserved.

Specifies whether a complex descriptor is available on this device.

Specifies whether a user descriptor is available on this device.

Reserved.

Definition at line 71 of file appFramework.h.

uint8_t NodeDescriptor_t::frequencyBand

APS capability flags. Not supported (always set to 0).

Bit mask for supported frequency bands.
Bit 0: 868 - 868.6 MHz
Bit 1: Reserved
Bit 2: 902 - 928 MHz
Bit 3: 2400 - 2483.5 MHz
Bit 4: Reserved.

Definition at line 83 of file appFramework.h.

MAC_CapabilityInf_t NodeDescriptor_t::macCapbFlags

MAC capability flags.
Bit 0: is the node capable of becoming an alternate PAN coordinator
Bit 1: device type (full-function vs. reduced-function device)
Bit 2: is the device mains-powered
Bit 3: is the receiver enabled when the device is idle
Bits 4-5: Reserved
Bit 6: is MAC security enabled
Bit 7: Always equals 1.

Definition at line 93 of file appFramework.h.

uint16_t NodeDescriptor_t::manufacturerCode

16-bit manufacturer code allocated by the ZigBee Alliance.

Definition at line 96 of file appFramework.h.

uint8_t NodeDescriptor_t::maxBufferSize

Maximum size of the network sub-layer data unit (NSDU) for this node, in octets. Valid range is 0x00-0x7f.

Definition at line 100 of file appFramework.h.

uint16_t NodeDescriptor_t::maxTransferSize

Maximum size of the application sub-layer data unit (ASDU) that can be transferred to this node in one single message transfer, in octets. Valid range is 0x0000-0x7fff. May exceed the maxBufferSize value through the use of fragmentation.

Definition at line 106 of file appFramework.h.

uint16_t NodeDescriptor_t::serverMask

Bit mask denoting the system server capabilities of this node.
Used to facilitate discovery of particular system servers by other nodes.
Bit 0: Primary Trust Center
Bit 1: Backup Trust Center
Bit 2: Primary Binding Table Cache
Bit 3: Backup Binding Table Cache
Bit 4: Primary Discovery Cache
Bit 5: Backup Discovery Cache
Bit 6: Network Manager
Bits 7-15: Reserved.

Definition at line 118 of file appFramework.h.

uint16_t NodeDescriptor_t::maxOutcTransferSize

Maximum size of the application sub-layer data unit (ASDU) that can be transferred from this node in one single message transfer, in octets. Valid range is 0x0000-0x7fff.

Definition at line 123 of file appFramework.h.

uint8_t NodeDescriptor_t::descriptorCapabilityField

Descriptor capabilities bit mask. Bit 0: Extended Active Endpoint list available
Bit 1: Extended Simple Descriptor list available
Bits 2-7: Reserved.

Definition at line 129 of file appFramework.h.
